channel.title: Tim Martin
channel.description: Is it day or night right now?

item.title: Haml Test
item.description:
Okay, so I shouldn't put a heading here at the beginnging of the body because pelican is going to parse the title from the head tag; I then use the title to create an H1 in front of this body content.

And here's another paragraph.

This is a section

And the text for that section! Voila!

Very nice.
item.dc:creator: Tim Martin
